title: Fraction to Decimal Conversion
description: Convert fractions to their equivalent decimal form.

questions.question: $ \text{Convert } \frac{2}{3} \text{ to a decimal (rounded to three decimal places).} $
$ \text{Find the decimal form of } \frac{1}{6} \text{ (rounded to three decimal places).} $
$ \text{What is } \frac{5}{6} \text{ as a decimal (rounded to three decimal places)?} $
$ \text{Convert } \frac{1}{3} \text{ to a decimal (rounded to three decimal places).} $
$ \text{Express } \frac{4}{9} \text{ as a decimal (rounded to two decimal places).} $
$ \text{What is the decimal equivalent of } \frac{5}{9} \text{ (rounded to two decimal places)?} $
$ \text{Find the decimal form of } \frac{7}{9} \text{ (rounded to three decimal places).} $
$ \text{Convert } \frac{1}{11} \text{ to a decimal (rounded to two decimal places).} $
$ \text{Express } \frac{3}{11} \text{ as a decimal (rounded to three decimal places).} $
$ \text{What is } \frac{5}{11} \text{ as a decimal (rounded to two decimal places)?} $
$ \text{Convert } \frac{1}{12} \text{ to a decimal (rounded to three decimal places).} $
$ \text{Find the decimal form of } \frac{5}{12} \text{ (rounded to three decimal places).} $
$ \text{What is } \frac{7}{12} \text{ as a decimal (rounded to two decimal places)?} $
